page.title: 05RELIGION
page.content: In the village of Sheepy Magna there only exists in 1985 the Anglican Church. The main church of the ecclesiastical parish is All Saints Sheepy Magna but there is a chapelry at Ratcliffe Culey. In Sheepy there is a good childrens' Sunday School with an age range between 5 and 12 years and attendance is about 30.Church membership in Sheepy is about 50. Men and women both hold responsible posts in the church though not in the ordained ministry.There is one ordained rector and he is responsible for the churches of Sheepy Magna, Ratcliffe Culey and Sibson. Other religions are catered for outside the area for example in Atherstone 3 miles away.
